title: Agencies accepting donations for quake victims
author: Ap
text: The following aid agencies are accepting contributions for assistance to victims of the earthquake in Turkey:     World Concern         19303 Fremont Ave. N.    Seattle, WA 98133     1-800-755-5022     www.worldconcern.org     Mercy Corps International     P.O. Box 9     Portland, OR 97207     1-800-292-3355, ext. 25     Adventist Development & Relief Agency     12501 Old Columbia Pike     Silver Spring, MD 20904     1-800-424-2372     www.adra.org     American Friends Service Committee     1501 Cherry St.    Philadelphia, PA 19102     1-888-588-2372     www.afsc.org     American Jewish World Service     989 Avenue of the Americas, 10th Floor     New York, NY 10018     1-800-889-7146     www.ajws.org     American Red Cross International Response Fund     P.O. Box 37243     Washington, D.C. 20013     1-800-HELP-NOW     Spanish: 1-800-257-7575     www.redcross.org     Brother's Brother Foundation     1501 Reedsdale St., Suite 3005     Pittsburgh, PA 15233     1-412-321-3160     www.brothersbrother.com     Catholic Relief Services     P.O. Box 17090     Baltimore, MD 21203-7090     1-800-736-3467     www.catholicrelief.org     Church World Service     28606 Phillips St.    P.O. Box 968 Elkhart, IN 46515        www.churchworldservice.org     Direct Relief International     27 S. La Patera Lane     Santa Barbara, CA 93117     1-800-676-1638     www.directrelief.org     Doctors of the World     375 West Broadway     New York, NY 10012     1-888-817-4357     www.doctorsoftheworld.org     Food for the Hungry International     7729 East Greenway Road     Scottsdale, AZ 85260     1-800-2-HUNGER     www.fh.org     International Aid     17011W. Hickory St.    Spring Lake, MI 49456     1-800-251-2502     www.internationalaid.org     Jewish Joint Distribution Committee     711 Third Ave., 10th Floor     New York, NY 10017     www.jdc.org     Lutheran World Relief     P.O. Box 17061     Baltimore, MD 21298-9832     1-800-LWR-LWR2     www.lwr.org     MAP International     2200 Glynco Parkway     P.O. Box 215000     Brunswick, GA 31521     1-800-225-8550     www.map.org     Operation USA     8320 Melrose Ave., 200     Los Angeles, CA 90069     1-800-678-7255     www.opusa.org
